item.title: cpp--chapter3--处理数据
item.description: 1 强制类型转换 // typecast.cpp -- forcing type changes #include <iostream> int main() { using namespace std; int auks, bats, coots; auks = 19.99 + 11.99; bats = (int) 19.99 + (int) 11.99; // old C syntax coots = int (19.99) + int (11.99); // new C++ syntax cout << "auks = " << auks << ", bats = " << bats; cout << ", coots
